title: Problem 2070_D
statement: You are given a rooted tree, consisting of n vertices. The vertices in the tree are numbered from 1 to n, and the root is the vertex 1. Let d_x be the distance (the number of edges on the shortest path) from the root to the vertex x.There is a chip that is initially placed at the root.
